Description: • Uses computer-assisted design/drafting (SolidWorks CAD) equipment and software to develop designs.• Create and revise production drawings (detail and assembly drawings).• Makes final sketch of proposed drawing, checking dimensions of parts, materials to be used, relation of one part to another, and relation of various parts to whole structure or project.• Sketches rough layout of machine and computes angles, weights, surface areas, dimensions, radii, clearances, tolerances, leverages, and location of holes.• Utilizes knowledge of various machines, engineering practices, mathematics, building materials, and other physical sciences to complete drawings.· Liaise with engineers in producing CAD drawings.· Coordinating services.· Producing sections and details to demonstrate practical installations.· Maintaining CAD library.Skills
Skills: · Keeping a directory of drawings up to date and documented.
· Keeping abreast of the related latest technology.
